strIntroduction: Experience Geneva's diversity, from the international sector to its historic center, on a guided city tour. Add the Mermaid’s Cruise on the lake for some additional sightseeing, and finish the day with a visit to Annecy, known as the Venice of the Alps.
strTitle: Geneva and Annecy tour by tram, boat and on foot

strIntroduction: Explore Annecy, the Venice of the Alps, which features an old town area with colorful pedestrian streets and lively markets. In addition to the picturesque center, you’ll admire stunning mountain landscapes on this half-day guided excursion from Geneva.
strTitle: The highlights of Annecy tour

strIntroduction: We will visit Lausanne, cultural center of Switzerland and a beautiful city built on hills. In the afternoon, we will drive through the canton of Vaud and along the lake passing by the famous towns of Vevey and Montreux.
strTitle: Lausanne-Montreux-Chillon

strIntroduction: Leave the hectic activity of the city far behind you on this excursion to one of the most attractive Alpine zones in Switzerland.
strTitle: Grindelwald and Interlaken from Zurich

strIntroduction: Leave the hectic activity of the city far behind you on this excursion to one of the most attractive Alpine zones in Switzerland, the heavenly Bernese Oberland and the breath-taking Jungfrau region. strTitle: Grindelwald and Interlaken from Zurich

strIntroduction: Get to know Zürich and its surroundings on a 4.5 hours extended city tour. Visit the Old Town with its churches, walk along the beautiful River Limmat, then ride on the aerial cable car for a breathtaking view over Lake Zürich and the snow-covered Alps!

strIntroduction: Experience the natural splendor and cultural richness of two countries on a full-day tour of the Zurich region and the Liechtenstein Principality. strIntroduction: Lucerne, the most charming of Switzerland's cities, is not to be missed. It's not just the famous sights – the Lion Monument and Kapellbrücke – that will enthrall you, visits to the Transport Museum and Rosengart Museum are also highly worthwhile.
